title: Saginaw Power Steering Pump Mounting Bracket, Black, Compatible with Chevy SBC V8
features: Compatible With Chevy Small Block, Most Saginaw-Style Power Steering Pumps, Long or Short Water Pump
description: Black Saginaw Power Steering Pump Mounting Bracket, For SBC V8, Compatible with Chevy, Compatible With GMThis power steering pump brackets allow the Saginaw-style pump to be mounted in a high or low position. Works best when alternator is mounted to the inside of the valve cover center-line. These will work with long or short water pump. Not recommended for use with exhaust mounted alternator. Details:Side MountBlackInstructions IncludedFits Small Block Chevy, Most GM Saginaw-Style Power Steering Pumps, Long or Short Water PumpCompatible with Chevrolet 1955-1991Compatible withGMC 1967-1991This bracket can be used on most pumps before 1969 and some later model V8 pumps up to 1985 with either a single or a double groove pulley. Common Fits 67-80 Camaro, 62-79 Nova, 64-68 Chevelle / Malibu, 64-65 El Camino, 64-67 Impala, 66-72 Caprice, 55-60 Chevy Trucks, 55-75 Bel Air.
